resources.string: This weapon is made of special metal alloy, making it a lot lighter compared to regular dagger.
It\'s a complex structure made of magical ice. A glowing gem is placed in the center of this peculiar device.
This ring is carved from magical ice. It\'s wearer is protected by the frost aura, slowing and damaging attacking enemies.
A shard of Spider Queen\'s carapace. You can see a piece of web gland inside it, it almost looks alive.

H-hello. Welcome to the Library. Here you can find the information about all sort of things, that can be found in the dungeon... actually we can only provide knowledge that was discovered by adventurers. It... it\'s kind of embarrassing. So each time you visit us, probably, there will be new things to read.
This tome is really huge. It holds all the knowledge, that adventurers has discovered in the dungeon.
Do you really want to step on this trap? You can probably die.
